name: OrderPriceAlteration
comment: This Entity hold an amount, usually of money, that modifies the price charged for an item
vf short description: This Entity hold an amount, usually of money, that modifies the price charged for an item

fields.name: OrderPriceAlterationSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: OrderPriceAlterationKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for each Price alteration Id in aLDM. Generated key based on Order Price Key, Order Price Alteration Id

fields.name: OrderPriceAlterationId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the Price Alteration in the source system. PriceAlteration.name

fields.name: OrderPriceAlterationName
fields.comment: Identifies the name of the price, for example, Subscription Price PriceAlteration.name

fields.name: OrderPriceAlterationDesc
fields.comment: Detailed description of the price alteration priceAlteration.description

fields.name: OrderItemSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderPriceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: RevenueTypeInd
fields.comment: Category of the price, for example, allowance, recurring, and so on priceAlteration.priceType

fields.name: RecurringChargePeriodInd
fields.comment: Recurring charge period. This property is populated if the price type is Recurring. priceAlteration.recurringChargePeriod

fields.name: RecurringChargePeriodDuration
fields.comment: The period length of the recurring charge. priceAlteration.recurringChargePeriodLength

fields.name: UnitOfMeasureInd
fields.comment: Unit of measurement of the price. This property is populated if the price type is allowance, such as gigabytes, minutes, and so on priceAlteration.unitOfMeasure

fields.name: PriorityInd
fields.comment: Priority of the price priceAlteration.priority

fields.name: AlterationTypeInd
fields.comment: Type of the alteration priceAlteration.alterationType

fields.name: PromotionActionId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the promotion action triggering this price alteration priceAlteration.promotionActionId

fields.name: ImmediatePromotionId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the promotion instance priceAlteration.immediatePromotionId

fields.name: AlterationProductOfferingPriceId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the product offering price on behalf of which the price alteration was given priceAlteration.alterationProductOfferingPriceId

fields.name: AlterationBundleProductOfferingId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the bundle product offering on behalf of which the price alteration was given priceAlteration.alterationBundleProductOfferingId

fields.name: AlterationApplyOrder
fields.comment: Order of the alteration price appliance priceAlteration.alterationApplyOrder

fields.name: ChargeTypeInd
fields.comment: Charge type represented by the price alteration. Valid values are:debitdiscountcredit priceAlteration.chargeType

fields.name: AlterationPriceTaxIncludedAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the altered tax included amount. priceAlteration.price.taxIncludedAmount.value

fields.name: AlterationPriceTaxAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the Altered Tax amount. priceAlteration.price.taxAmount.value

fields.name: AlterationPriceDutyFreeAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the Altered Duty Free amount. priceAlteration.price.dutyFreeAmount.value

fields.name: AlterationPriceTaxRate
fields.comment: Indicates the Altered Price tax Rate. priceAlteration.price.taxRate

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Source creation date. //Customized

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Source update date. //Customized

fields.name: AlterationPricePercentage
fields.comment: Indicates the altered price percentage. priceAlteration.price.percentage

fields.name: AlterationPriceReductionAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the altered price reduction amount. priceAlteration.price.priceReduction.value

fields.name: AlterationPriceOverrideAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the altered price override amount. priceAlteration.price.priceOverride.value

fields.name: AlterationPriceRecordId
fields.comment: Indicates the altered price record id in case the alteration given is part of complex pricing. priceAlteration.price.priceRecordId

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceDetailSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
